definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Is 51:5 deliverance, rescue, salvation, also safety, welfare;—Ps 20:7 + 4 t.; [[יֶ֫שַׁע]] Job 5:11 + 4 t.; sf. [[יִשְׁעִי]] 2Sa 22:3 + 11 t., + 14 t. sfs.;—
safety, welfare, prosperity 2Sa 23:5, Ps 12:6, Job 5:4, Job 5:11.

salvation, i.e. primarily physical rescue, by God, oft. with added spiritual idea: Is 62:11, Ps 69:14, Ps 85:8, Ps 85:10; [[יֵשַׁע אֱלֽהִים]] salvation from God Ps 50:23; used as infin. with acc. [[לְיֵשַׁע]] Hb Hab 3:13, Hab 3:13 (see Ew:§ 239 a); accordingly Yahweh is [[אוֹרִי וְיִשְׁעִי]] my light and my salvation Ps 27:1; [[חוּר ישׁע]] Ps 95:1; [[קֶרֶן ישׁע]] Ps 18:3 = 2Sa 22:3; [[אֱלֽהֵי ישׁע]] Is 17:10, Mic 7:7, Hb Hab 3:18, Ps 18:47 = [[אֱלֽהֵי חוּר ישׁע]] 2Sa 22:47, Ps 24:5, Ps 25:5, Ps 27:9, Ps 65:6, Ps 79:9, Ps 85:5, 1Ch 16:35; ´[[מָגֵן ישׁ]] Ps 18:36 = 2Sa 22:36; [[על אלהים ישׁעי]] Ps 62:8; ‖[[חְדָקָה]] Is 45:8, Is 51:5, Is 61:10; [[שְׂשׂוֹן יִשְׁעְֶָ]] Ps 51:14 joy of thy salvation ´[[כּׂהֲנֶיהָ אַלְבִּישׁ ישׁ]] Ps 132:16 her priests will clothe with salvation.
victory: [[גְּבוּרוֹת יֵשַׁע יְמִינוֹ]] Ps 20:7 the mighty deeds of the victory of his right hand.
